Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.soloMode

Class SoloMode

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Observable<ServerMessage>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.soloMode.SoloMode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<GameEvent>
public class SoloMode
extends Game
This class extends the main class of the model Game, implementing one of the two possible modalities of Maestri del Rinascimento board game. This mode is played only by one player versus Lorenzo il Magnifico, who makes his moves by drawing tokens and activating their effects.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(HitLastSpace event)
      Implementation of the method called when HitLastSpace conclusion event is reached. In Solo Mode when the player reaches the last space, he automatically wins.
      Specified by:
      endGame in class Game
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(SeventhDevCardBought event)
      Implementation of the method called when SeventhDevCardBought conclusion event is reached. In Solo Mode when the player buys his seventh card, he automatically wins.
      Specified by:
      endGame in class Game
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(DevCardColorEnded event)
      Implementation of the method called when DevCardColorEnded conclusion event is reached. In Solo Mode when a dev card color ends, the player automatically loses.
      Overrides:
      endGame in class Game
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered.

    • endGame

      public void endGame​(BlackCrossHitLastSpace event)
      Implementation of the method called when BlackCrossHitLastSpace conclusion event is reached. In Solo Mode when Lorenzo il Maginifico reaches the last space, the player automatically loses.
      Overrides:
      endGame in class Game
      Parameters:
      event - the event triggered.

    • moveOtherPlayers

      public void moveOtherPlayers​(Player triggeringPlayer, int discardedResources)
      Moves Lorenzo il Magnifico by a number of positions equals to the number of discarded resources.
      Specified by:
      moveOtherPlayers in class Game
      Parameters:
      triggeringPlayer - the player who discarded the resources and doesn't have to be moved.
      discardedResources - the number of spaces to move Lorenzo il Magnifico by.

    • LorenzoActivatedAVaticanReport

      public void LorenzoActivatedAVaticanReport​(int vaticanIndex)
      Method called when a vatican report is activated by Lorenzo il Magnifico on the given section. The player checks his Faith Track: if his Faith Marker is on a space within or beyond the activated Vatican Report section, turn the Pope's Favor tile of that section face-up, else discard the Pope's Favor tile from that section. Then notifies his remote view of the overcome of this Vatican Report activation by Lorenzo il Magnifico.
      Parameters:
      vaticanIndex - the section index which the vatican report has been activated on.

    • activateVaticanReport

      public void activateVaticanReport​(Player triggeringPlayer, int vatican_index)
      Method called when a vatican report is activated by the player on the given section. This method is called only if the correspondent Favor Tile is FACEDOWN. Since this means that Lorenzo il Magnifico has not activated the vatican report on this section yet, automatically turns the correspondent Favor Tile face up. Then notifies the remote view of the overcome of this Vatican Report activation.
      Specified by:
      activateVaticanReport in class Game
      Parameters:
      triggeringPlayer - the player who activated the Vatican Report.
      vatican_index - the section index which the vatican report has been activated on.

    • notifyGameSetup

      public void notifyGameSetup()
      Notifies the remote view of the player in game when the game has been setup by sending him the first simplified instance of the game.
      Specified by:
      notifyGameSetup in class Game
